body: Oh wow, it's kind of masterpiece for me, i can relate so much to the male character, however I can say something like someone else said, i think the world already on its perfect condition, and the doomsday probably.... Oh wow, forgot about this, you just waste your time reading this anw, and I waste my time write this nonsense

Damn, never though i would see the day when i could watch a hentai character, and feel so related to them... whats worse, if many of the comments are true, then hummanity is just worst than demons in a way, dont you think?
@はあちび I mean, a lot of people could relate to their struggles, so a self-insert kinda makes sense in that regard.
I really relate to the guy
@Keepitquiet read the last page, it was probably commissioned by someone else

It's kind of obvious when an author writes an edgy protagonist like this that they're either self-inserting, or pandering, and it's even more obvious when it's transformation into a non-human. Still, would be nice to escape the prison of human society and expectations, so I would also not mind being genderbent and turned into a succubus daughter. Can't tell if I want to favorite this or not though...
Damn, I think this is the most wholesome doujin I’ve seen with the gender bender tag
Wow, i kinda felt related to the story of the guy here. Loved the ending
wow a taku doujin where the guy is turned into a sexy girl but doesn't die. that is quite rare.
I hate vore but this one I like it
I really dont like vore but the vore in this was pretty subtle and i enjoyed it surprisingly. Very wholesome
Sooo I'm not really into vore,but this was so holesome, I love it
Sometimes? I think all the time lol humanity is a virus

Someone decided this was worth their time to clean, translate, and typeset before posting here. Not to mention the fucking weirdo who decided to make it in the first place. Sometimes I think humanity should end.
